body_content.explanation: an actor whose voice may be used in different ways, for example, acting in a radio play, speaking in a filmed advertisement, speaking the part of a character in an animated film (= one created from drawings, models, etc.), or speaking the part of another actor in a film that has been dubbed (= the spoken parts have been changed into a different language):
examples: He is a voice actor - the Spanish voice of Batman in films and animated series.
He is a prolific and talented voice actor, and has been cast in the upcoming Disney remake of Aladdin.
